thread.title: This girl just got asked to the prom in the most adorable way
thread.title_full: This girl just got asked to the prom in the most adorable way

author: Bristol Palin
title: This girl just got asked to the prom in the most adorable way
text:
March 23, 2017 by Bristol Palin 
I love sweet prom proposals but this one might take the cake… or the Doritos, I should say! 
Eighteen-year-old Shaedon Wedel came up with the sweetest way to ask his best friend’s 15-year-old sister to his senior prom. Playing off Carlie Wittman’s love of Doritos, he showed up to her house wearing a shirt that said: 
“I know I’m NACHO typical Dorito but… I’m going to be CHEESY and ask: Will you go to prom with me?” 
He even brought her a bag of her favorite snack and beautiful roses. That was enough to make her squeal with delight and say “yes,” of course. 
Shaedon said he didn’t do it for the publicity, but “to make her happy.” 
“She deserves a lot,” he said. “Anyone who’s ever around her, she makes them laugh. She always has a smile on her face. She’s amazing,” 
Shaedon sent out a sweet tweet, too: Can’t wait for prom with this sweet gal pic.twitter.com/z3Lc66YRW3 
— Shaedon Wedel (@shardonwedel) March 17, 2017 
Click CONTINUE to see a video of this precious moment:
